metadata.title: CVE-2022-35111 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SWFTools commit 772e55a2 was discovered to contain a stack overflow via__sanitizer::StackDepotNode::hash(__sanitizer::StackTrace const&) at/sanitizer_common/sanitizer_stackdepot.cpp.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
